text: Mutation without, corruption within.
effect: Roll once on the Malignancies table and apply the result.

text: Trust in your fear.
effect: Increase Perception by 5. Gain the Phobia Mental Disorder.

text: Humans must die so that humanity can endure.
effect: Gain the Jaded talent. If already possessed, increase Willpower by 2 instead.

text: The pain of the bullet is ecstasy compared to damnation.
effect: Reduce Agility by 3. The first time this character suffers Critical damage each session, roll 1d10. On a result of 10, he does not suffer any Critical Effects, though the damage still counts as Critical damage.

text: Be a boon to your allies and the bane of your enemies.
effect: Gain the Hatred (choose any one) talent. If already possessed, increase Strength by 2 instead.

text: The wise learn from the deaths of others.
effect: Increase Agility or Intelligence by 3. Reduce Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill by 3.

text: Kill the alien before it can speak its lies.
effect: Gain the Quick Draw talent. If already possessed, increase Agility by 2 instead.

text: Truth is subjective.
effect: Increase Perception by 3. The first time this character would gain 1 or more Corruption points each session, he gains that amount plus 1 instead.

text: Thought begets Heresy.
effect: Reduce Intelligence by 3. The first time this character would gain 1 or more Corruption points each session, he reduces that amount by 1 (to a minimum of 0) instead.

text: Heresy begets Retribution.
effect: Increase Fellowship or Strength by 3. Reduce Toughness or Willpower by 3.

text: A mind without purpose wanders in dark places.
effect: When gaining Mental Disorders, the character may choose to gain a new Disorder instead of increasing the severity of an existing Disorder.

text: If a job is worth doing, it is worth dying for.
effect: Increase Toughness or Willpower by 3. Reduce Fellowship or Strength by 3.

text: Dark dreams lie upon the heart.
effect: Whenever this character would roll on the Malignancies table, he may instead select any one result and gain that Malignancy.

text: Violence solves everything.
effect: Increase Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill by 3. Reduce Agility or Intelligence by 3.

text: Ignorance is a wisdom of its own.
effect: Reduce Perception by 3. The first time this character would gain 1 or more Insanity points each session, he reduces that amount by 1 (to a minimum of 0) instead.

text: Only the insane have strength enough to prosper.
effect: Increase Willpower by 3. The first time this character would gain 1 or more Insanity points each session, he gains that amount plus 1 instead.

text: A suspicious mind is a healthy mind.
effect: Increase Perception by 2. Additionally, the character may re-roll Awareness tests to avoid being Surprised.

text: Suffering is an unrelenting instructor.
effect: Reduce Toughness by 3. The first time this character suffers any damage each session, he gains a +20 bonus to the next test he makes before the end of his next turn.

text: The only true fear is dying without your duty done.
effect: Gain the Resistance (Cold, Heat, or Fear) talent. If already possessed, increase Toughness by 2 instead.

text: Only in death does duty end.
effect: The first time this character would suffer Fatigue each session, he suffers that amount of Fatigue minus 1 (to a minimum of 0) instead.

text: Innocence is an illusion.
effect: Gain the Keen Intuition talent. If already possessed, increase Intelligence by 2 instead.

text: To war is human.
effect: Gain the Dodge skill as a Known skill (rank 1). If already possessed, increase Agility by 2 instead.

text: There is no substitute for zeal.
effect: Gain the Clues from the Crowds talent. If already possessed, increase Fellowship by 2 instead.

text: Even one who has nothing can still offer his life.
effect: When this character burns Fate threshold to survive a lethal injury, roll 1d10. On a result of 10, he survives whatever grievous wound would have killed him but does not reduce his Fate threshold.

text: Do not ask why you serve. Only ask how.
effect: Increase Fate threshold by 1.
